quote_first: Oh yes. His clocks were set at
quote_last: , four minutes past five and seven minutes past five. That was the combination number of a safe, 515457. The safe was concealed behind a reproduction of the Mona Lisa. Inside the safe, continued Poirot, with distaste, "were the Crown Jewels of the Russian Royal Family."
title: The Clocks
author: Agatha Christie
